songs.lyrics:
Kasari byakta garaun ma ee mera bhawana
Sadhai khusi rakhna sakun timilai meri aama
Junijuni rahos mero saathma timro chhaayaa

Timro aashirbaad ani timro ajambari maya
Daibale sadhai khushi thamaidiun timro haatma
Sustauna paun sadhaibhari timro kaakhma
Jharanako paani bhanda nischal timro mamataa
Himal jhai bishaal timro sangharsa kshamata
Atitka sabai apthyara kshan eklai rudai sahyau timile
Tara puchhidinthyau mera sabai aansu pachhyaurile
Sasaana aawasyakta pura garna pachhi hatenau
Hamro bhabisyalai ladyau aafnai khyaal garenau
Mahasus hundaichha mera sabai bhoolharu aaja
Paschatap gardaichhu ma bihana sanjha
Kati jani najani maile pida diyen hola
Maaf garideu aama ma timro badmaas chhora

Timro muhaarma sadhai haanso hos
Timro sadaibako aayu hos
Timibhanda thulo ishwor hundaina bho
Timi devi timi nai mero daiba ho
Timro muhaarma sadhai haanso hos
Timro sadaibako aayu hos
Timibhanda thulo ishwor hundaina bho
Timi devi timi nai mero daiba ho

Suryako taap chhekidinchha aama timro chhaayaale
Sarbashrestha rahanechhau aama timi jahilei
Dukha pida sahera ni muskuraunchhau jahilei
Maatriprem bhanda thulo aru hune chhaina kehi
Ma sakdina aama timilai kohi sanga ni daajna
Pabitra yo bhandhanlai kasle sakchha ra naaghna
Tyo kasto maanis jasle sakchha aafnai aama tyaagna
Aruko kura sunera jo khojdachha bhaagna
Garna gaarho chha barnan timro sahanshilta
Rokiyela khola tara rokne chhaina timro mamata
Kehi nabole ni timi bujhchhau mero maunata
Meri aama timi nai hau mero devidewata
Jaba ma runthe pidale aadhi raatma
Swargako anubhuti hunthyo timro kaakhma
Bhagyamaani bhayechhu ma timilai pai saathma
Timile sikayau aama kalam kaapi chyapna

Timro muhaarma sadhai haanso hos
Timro sadaibako aayu hos
Timibhanda thulo ishwor hundaina bho
Timi devi timi nai mero daiba ho
Timro muhaarma sadhai haanso hos
Timro sadaibako aayu hos
Timibhanda thulo ishwor hundaina bho
Timi devi timi nai mero daiba ho

Maile aaja samma kati ruwayen hola
Jati biswaas gardapani diyen sadhai dhoka
Achamma lagchha taipani dekhda mayako khola
Bishaal mutu chha timro tesaile hola
Mero pyaaro chhora bhandai angaaloma bandhchhau
Mero nimti marchhau timi merai laagi baachchhau
Mero nimti royau ani merai lagi hanschhau
Tara jati garda pani dukha matra payau
Tara aama aba ma thulo hundaichhu
Timra harek tyaag ko karan kuro bujhdaichhu
Eklai biteka palharu samjhidai rudainchhu
Kukur thiyen ma balla manchhe huna sikdaichhu
Sadhai saath dinechhu aba aaune dinma
Tadha bhagaidinechhu sabai bhaya ra chinta
Sewa garna chahanchhu ma timro sadhaibhari
Yasaigari maya matrai pairakhun sadhaibhari

Timro muhaarma sadhai haanso hos
Timro sadaibako aayu hos
Timibhanda thulo ishwor hundaina bho
Timi devi timi nai mero daiba ho
Timro muhaarma sadhai haanso hos
Timro sadaibako aayu hos
Timibhanda thulo ishwor hundaina bho
Timi devi timi nai mero daiba ho
songs.title: Aama
